item.title: Vitalik on the only correct date format
item.description:
vitalik.eth on Twitter

“YYYY-MM-DD is the only correct date format. * It’s an ISO standard: https://t.co/n3wKGrNuMH * It’s unambiguous (is 03/05/22 March 5 or May 3? No such problem here!) * General-purpose sorting sorts dates correctly * East Asian countries like Japan 🇯🇵🇯🇵🇯🇵 use it (“2022年5月3日”)”

URL: https://twitter.com/VitalikButerin/status/1547161382373756928

source: Wednesday assorted links

item.title: Book review: "Slouching Toward Utopia"
item.description:
“It’s beautiful…even if it’s where everybody died.” — Nakagawa Noriko This may actually be the first book review I’ve done before a book has actually been released! Fortunately, I was able to secure an advance copy of the book from my podcast co-host, Brad DeLong. The book comes out September 6th, so hopefully this review can tide you over until then…

URL: https://noahpinion.substack.com/p/book-review-slouching-toward-utopia?utm_source=substack&utm_campaign=post_embed&utm_medium=web

source: Well, Well, Well: Today Is a Very Good Day for the Book Slouching Towards Utopia

item.title: The News: We Can See Clearly Now
item.description:
Putting aside the usual woes, which are as woeful as ever this week, let’s just take a moment to talk about what the Webb telescope is going to do for us, and why scientific investigation of the universe is such a happy and soothing thing for many of us…

URL: https://timothyburke.substack.com/p/the-news-we-can-see-clearly-now?utm_source=substack&utm_campaign=post_embed&utm_medium=web

source: Well, Well, Well: Today Is a Very Good Day for the Book Slouching Towards Utopia

item.title: No Housing Please, We're a Community
item.description:
I received a really interesting, insightful comment on a subscribers-only piece from a few weeks ago, on the tension between community and continuity on the one hand, and development and growth on the other. I had mentioned in passing the right-wing meme “I will not live in a pod,” which refers to the supposed notion that liberals want to cram everyone i…

URL: https://thedeletedscenes.substack.com/p/no-housing-thank-you-were-a-community?utm_source=substack&utm_campaign=post_embed&utm_medium=web

source: Well, Well, Well: Today Is a Very Good Day for the Book Slouching Towards Utopia

item.title: Strategies of Unusual Size
item.description:
May 6, 2022 I wrapped the 2022 edition of my undergraduate “Grand Strategy” seminar this past Tuesday. I like teaching the class. I really do. But I have significant reservations about “grand strategy” as a classroom subject. I’m not at all convinced that…

item.title: The rule of nihilists
item.description:
A friend sent me recently an abbreviated version of Xi Jinping’s January 2013 speech to the members of the Central Committee of CPC (the English translation is here). The speech is often mentioned, generally in the context of greater ideological control and “authoritarian tendencies” of Xi Jinping, but I have not read it until I got it from him…

URL: https://branko2f7.substack.com/p/the-rule-of-nihilists?utm_source=substack&utm_campaign=post_embed&utm_medium=web

source: Well, Well, Well: Today Is a Very Good Day for the Book Slouching Towards Utopia
